Keywords: Council of Kangs , Future , Past , Ruler , Scientist , Warrior
Real Name: Nathaniel Richards
Special Powers
TARGETING: Adjacent
SUMMON THE COUNCIL OF KANGS: The bystanders on this card are "Kangs Through Time" and each have [MAX 1]. // Leadership. When Kang the Conqueror uses it and succeeds, you may instead generate a Kangs Through Time bystander.
MASTER OF TIME: Phasing/Teleport. When Kang the Conqueror uses it and moves 5 squares or less, after resolutions he may make an attack.
LET'S TRY THAT AGAIN: Super Senses, Toughness. When Kang the Conqueror uses Super Senses and succeeds, after resolutions heal him 1 click. If a 6 was rolled, heal him 3 clicks instead. Protected: Outwit.
Trade Kang the Conqueror Want Kang the Conqueror

November 10, 2022
AlaskanX
I really like how the bystander tokens are all direct references to previous Kang dials with the Council of Kangs keyword: "Conqueror" is ABPI056 Kang, the Conqueror (specifically clicks 1 & 2), "Immortus" is AVAS058 Immortus (clicks 5 & 6), and "Kang" is AOU104 Kang the Conqueror (click 4).

October 28, 2022

Enter The Wu-kang(36 Richards)
October 24, 2022
Oathful
For his first appearance in years, Kang brings a good amount of power to the table. Phasing-Move and Attack, a nice long dial that shows off his time traveling powers and a set of really good bystanders. I personally like the Illuminati Kang a little more though for how big brain it made you feel when you could pull his mechanic off, but this Kang definitely beats him out in ease-of-use and front loaded power. // Thematic: 8.5/10, Viability: 8/10, Fun Factor: 8/10, fairly balanced fun.
